maqras.text: 26|52|Arau ami muchara prati e'i marme ahi karaichilo ye, ‘amara bandasakalaka lai raatira bhitarate ola'i yoraa, niscaya tomalokaka piche piche khedi yoraa ha’ba’.
26|53|Tara pichata phira'a'une caharae caharae loka sangrahakarai praerana karaile
26|54|‘niscaya ihamta ksudra eta dala
26|55|‘arau niscaya sihamte amara kraodha udraeka karaiche
26|56|‘arau niscaya ami sakalo sadaya satarka’.
26|57|Parainamata ami phira'a'una gosthika sihamtara udyanasamuha arau prasraranara paraa bahiskara karailo
26|58|lagate dhana-bhandara arau manorama saudhamalara paraa'o.
26|59|E'idarae'i haichila arau ami bani icharaa'ilaka karaichilo e'iborara adhikarai.
26|60|Tara pichata sihamte suryodayara praakamuhurtata te'omlokara picha la’le.
26|61|Eteke yetiya duyo dale parasparaka dekhile, tetiya muchara sangisakale ka’le, ‘niscaya ami dharaa parailo!’
26|62|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘ketiya'o nahaya, mora lagata mora pratipalaka ache; anatipalame te'om moka pathanirdesa karaiba’.
26|63|Tara pichata ami muchara prati ahi karailo ye, ‘tomara lakhutirae sagarata aghata karaa’. Phalata sagara bibhakta hai pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatara darae hai ga’la
26|64|arau ami ana dalatoko se'i tha'ira nikatararti karailo
26|65|arau ami ud'dhara karailo mucha arau te'omra sangisakala
26|66|tara pichata duba'i marailo anato dalaka.
26|67|Niscaya iyara majata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya.
26|68|Arau niscaya tomara raba mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|69|Arau tumi sihamtara ocarata ibraahimara brttanta barnana karaa.
26|70|Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaa’
26|71|sihamte ka’le, ‘ami murti puja karao; eteke ami nisthara saite se'itoke dharai thakima’.
26|72|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke yetiya ahbana karaa tetiya se'iborae tomalokara ahbana suna payane
26|73|‘athaba sihamte tomalokara upakara na'iba ksati karaiba parae neki’
26|74|sihamte ka’le, ‘baram ami amara pitrpurausa sakalaka pa'icho, te'omloke enekuraa'i karaichila’.
26|75|Ibraahime ka’le, ‘tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane, yisakalara ibadata tomaloke karaa
26|76|‘tomaloka arau tomalokara pitrpurausa sakala
26|77|‘ataye mora satrau kerala bisbajagatara raba (allaha)ra bahirae.
26|78|‘Yijane moka srsti karaiche, tara pichata teraemi moka hidayata diche.
26|79|‘Teraemi moka ahara karaaya arau teraemi moka pana karaaya.
26|80|‘Arau yetiya ma'i asustha ha'om, tetiya teraemi moka araogya karae.
26|81|‘Teraemi mora mrtyu ghataba arau teraemi moka punarjiraita karaiba.
26|82|‘Arau te'omra ocarate'i mora asa ye, te'om moka kiyamatara dina mora aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba.
26|83|‘He mora raba! Moka hikamata dana karaa arau satkarmasilasakalara antarbhukta karaa.
26|84|‘Arau pararartisakalara majata mora sunama-sukhyati abyahata raakha
26|85|‘arau moka sukhamaya jannatara adhikaraisakalara antarbhukta karaa
26|86|‘arau mora pitrka ksama karaa, niscaya te'om pathabhrastabilakara antarbhukta achila.
26|87|‘Arau (he mora raba!) Punaraut'thanara dina moka lanchita nakaraiba.
26|88|‘Yidina dhana-sampada- arau santana-santati kono kamata nahiba
26|89|‘se'idina upakrta ha’ba kerala se'i byakti, yijane lai ahiba allahara ocarata bisud'dha antahkarana’.
26|90|Arau (se'idina) muttakbisakalara babe nikatararti karaa ha’ba jannata
26|91|arau pathabhrastasakalara babe unmocita karaa ha’ba jahannama
26|92|sihamtaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomalokara se'ibora upasya ka’ta, yiborara tomaloke upasana karaichila
26|93|allahara paraibarte? Sihamte tomalokaka sahaya karaiba paraene athaba sihamte atmaraksa karaibalai saksama ne
26|94|tara pichata se'i upasyaboraka arau pathabhrastabilakaka talamura karai jahannamata niksepa karaa ha’ba
26|95|lagate ibalichara sain'yabahinibilakako.
26|96|Sihamte tata bitarkata lipta hai ka’ba
26|97|‘allahara sapata! Niscaya ami spasta pathabhrastatata achilo
26|98|‘yetiya ami tomalokaka srstijagatara pratipalakara samakaksa buli ganya karaichilo
26|99|‘arau amaka kerala aparaadhibilake'i pathabhrasta karaichila
26|100|‘Eteke amara kono chuparaichakarai na'i’.
26|101|‘Arau kono antaranga bandhu'o na'i.
26|102|‘Haya, yadi ami akau ebara ubhati yoraara suyoga palohemtena, tente ami muminasakalara antarbhukta hai ga’lohemtena!’
26|103|Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya.
26|104|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|105|Nuha sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila.
26|106|Yetiya sihamtara bhatr nuhe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
26|107|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|108|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anusarana karaa.
26|109|‘Arau ma'i tomalokara ocarata iyara babe kono pratidana nibicarao; mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|110|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.’
